item.title: Embarking on the Journey of Containers With Docker Essential Commands
item.description: Docker has become a cornerstone in the modern software development landscape. It empowers developers to package and run applications in a consistent and portable manner, irrespective of the underlying infrastructure. This guide serves as a gentle introduction to Docker, delving into the essential commands that will kickstart your journey into the world of containers. 1. Verifying Docker Installation: The first step is to verify that Docker is installed on your system. Run the following command:
